text: 15.14 Ais 9.16, Mal 2.8, Mat 23.16, Luk 6.39, Lom 2.19 Bɨ Pelisi anɨb okok kɨlop gos pal ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Kɨli bɨ wɨdɨn koy tek mɨdebal, kɨli bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop kanɨb yomnɨg apal agak. Pen bɨ wɨdɨn koy olap, bɨ wɨdɨn koy olap nop poŋɨd dad amɨl nɨm, omɨŋal gɨl kaw mɨgan ak apyap pakɨnɨgayl agak.
